info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 11:58AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT WESTERN GARFIELD...KANE AND SOUTHEASTERN IRON COUNTIES... At 1155 AM MST...an area of heavy snow will spread across south central Utah through 2 PM. Winter driving conditions can be expected along Highway 89 between Panguitch and Kanab, as well as Highway 12 from near Bryce Canyon City east to Escalante. Locations impacted include... Kanab, Escalante, Zion National Park, Panguitch, Henrieville, Boulder, Hatch, Antimony, Bryce Canyon National Park, Panguitch Lake, Red Canyon, Cedar Breaks National Monument, Orderville, Tropic, Glendale, Cannonville, Alton, Coral Pink Sand Dunes, Hillsdale and Long Valley Junction. This includes the following highways... US Route 89 between mile markers 10 and 149. Utah Route 12 between mile markers 0 and 104. * winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. * snowfall accumulation of 1 to 3 inches is expected in this area of heavy snow through 2 PM.
